titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the importation of forraine gun-powder, and that His Maiesties subiects may be constantly supplied out of His Maiesties store-houses.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster, the twentieth day of February, in the twelfth yeere of His Highnesse reigne. ...
Imprint from colophon. The publication year is given according to Lad
Arms 23 (with C R at the top); Steele notation: other minions, 2) pow- Star-.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
